transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes, namaskar sir, main Kusum baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes, I'm audible to you sir, aawaz aa rahi hai abhi aapko?
Customer: Haan ji madam bataiye ji.
Executive: Yes, namaskar sir, main Kusum baat kar rahi hu relationship manager IndiaMART se. Aapke kal aapke account manager ka discussion hua hoga sir, milid ka services ko regarding, yes?
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Haan ji, toh actually na unhone abhi aapse approx 30 days baad connect kiya. Toh jab koi bhi account manager apne company se baat karta hai aur 30 din ke baad connect karta hai na, toh usme feedback jaata hai ki jo bhi conversation base hua. Toh aapne usko not satisfied mark kar diya, that's why hamare paas ye concern raise ho gaya ki client ko issue hai shayad isi wajah se not satisfied mark kiya hoga, hai na? Yes. Toh woh bhi employee ke liye not satisfied mark kiya hai, toh woh is wajah se hum puchna chahte the ki exactly kya concern raha sir ke
Customer: Aapne woh mark kiya hai? Toh taaki aap mujhe bata paaye uske upar hum action le paaye. Aap mujhe bataye kya concern hai aapka abhi?
Customer: Aah, madam isme na last jo ek mahine pehle baat hui thi aur usse bhi ek mahine pehle, matlab aap ye laga lo ye wali conversation chhod ke jo last do baar se hamari baat hui hai do mahine mein, unko main kuch problem bata raha hu toh uska koi solution nahi de rahe hai. Woh sirf unki sirf teen line hoti hai, main aapko line bata deta hu, aap chahe aap call recording hogi aap unki. Unki sirf teen line hoti hai, sir aap leads by leads pe jayenge, waha GST verified lead hogi aap woh dekhiye. Jo bulk leads hai aap woh lijiye aur ek woh bolte hai ki sir maximum lead aap consume kariye. Jo meri problem hai actually madam problem meri ye hai jo aap ye sabse pehle bolte hai GST certified jo parties hoti hai aap unki lead lo. Madam hum unhi ke lead agar uthayenge toh woh lead uthati woh bolte hai sir hum bhi same product hum ye sell kar rahe hai, aap humse leke bech lo. Toh woh lead buyer ki jagah seller ho gaya woh toh. Second ye bolte hai bulk wali uthaya karo sir jisme quantity zyada ho jo aapko zyada business degi.
Hum woh uthate hai toh usme bolte hai nahi sir humne toh galti se 600 piece, 1000 piece daal diye the, hume toh ek piece ki requirement hai aap hume ek piece de dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Toh majorly aapka jo issue aa raha hai woh by lead mein aata hai ki jo customer aapko yaha par genuine customer nahi hai.
Customer: Genuine customer nahi hai. Toh aur isme kya andar ki cheez agar aapne mujhe batai toh woh ye batai client ko call karta bol deta ya toh humne requirement nahi dala aur dala hai toh aah matlab aap humse purchase kar lo khud hi seller ban kar.
Executive: Haan ya fir haan ya fir haan ya fir woh hota hai ki jo 100 piece, 200 piece daal raha woh keh raha nahi nahi ji hum toh rate try kar rahe the, hume toh ek hi piece chahiye aap ek piece de do hume.
Customer: Hume ek piece dene mein bhi koi dikkat nahi hai but wohi baat hai na woh ek piece ke liye hum itna nahi kar payenge na ki usko pan India hum delivery de sake ek piece ki.
Executive: Nahi nahi theek hai main aapka samajh rahi hu.
Customer: Haan ji. Ye ye concern mera last teen mahine se hai but woh har baar ye sir aap ek baar phone call pe aajiye. Woh woh hamari profile kholte hai, jo thod thoda matlab rate kya thode kam zyada kar dete hai usse kya profile upar aa jati hai. Char panch din lead achi aati hai par achi matlab jaha do teen din lead aa rahi thi waha panch saat lead aane lag jati hai par woh bhi genuine nahi hai. Toh hum pareshan ho gaye na madam woh baar baar repeat karke. Shuru mein jab IndiaMART package laaya tha main ye nahi keh raha ki abhi tak hume koi business nahi diya IndiaMART ne. Starting mein hume char panch mahine acha response aaya hai. Uske baad ekdum jab response bilkul hi stop ho gaya hai, pata hi nahi hota manager kaun hai hamara, har baar naya call aata hai. Toh matlab kuch maje wali baat hai nahi madam ye.
Executive: Aapke sare points maine note down kar liye hai sir. Dekhiye main aapko aisa koi jaan wali baat nahi karungi. Theek hai aap jis issue mujhe bata rahe ho woh mere ko samajh aaya hai. Toh aap ek minute call pe ruko, main check kar rahi hu ki kya aise improvement areas hai jiski wajah se matlab jo employee ko discuss karna chahiye usne nahi abhi tak aapko update kiya hai. Theek hai? Toh aap please call pe rukiye. Let me check. Main aapka time waste nahi karungi sir.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, koi baat nahi.
Executive: Ye maine aapko WhatsApp pe hi likh ke bheja hai. Ab agar aap apna WhatsApp pe hi likh ke bheja hua maine aapko. Aap ek baar aisa karo apna IndiaMART ka app open karo aap.
Customer: Home page pe jayiyega. Jaha pe likha hoga hi greek.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji home page ke upar.
Executive: Hai na? Haan home page pe jao hi greek three lines pe click karoge home page pe aa jaoge screen ko thoda upar ki taraf scroll karte raho. Thoda sa niche se up pe agar aap rahoge na waha pe ek option milega performance scorecard ka.
Customer: Ek second madam performance performance scorecard. Thoda sa screen scroll kijiye.
Executive: Three dots pe click karne ke baad keh rahe ho na madam?
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Jo upar hi greek likha hua hai waha pe three dots hai unse three lines hai us pe click karne ke baad dhundna hai na woh performance.
Executive: Home page pe haan first option pe home page aa jayega us pe click karo then aap screen scroll karoge toh niche ki side option aayega performance scorecard you have. Thoda screen scroll karna padega upar ki side. Toh niche aap madam sabse niche toh wohi aa gaya rating wala aa gaya hai. Looking for laser print nahi ye sare mere product aa gaye hai India by lead balance 10. Lead manager bhi.
Executive: Ruko ruko main bhejti hu WhatsApp aap apna open karo WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Kar liya madam.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap mera point samajhne ki koshish karna fir answer karna ya fir aap jo cheez main bata rahi hu uske upar agree hona ya jo bhi aapko revert karna hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ye last July June se leke November tak ka pura keh sakte hai hum database main aapko aapka dikha rahi hu. Jaha pe lack ho raha hai agar ye ye improve ho jayega toh ho sakta hai ye jo aapka issue aa raha hai sir clients sahi nahi milna dekho deal mature nahi hona client aa raha hai price leke chala ja raha hai woh ek alag scenario hai. Customer deal aap karo customer ko kaise tackle karna hai market mein customer kaisa bechta hai woh aapka aur hamara aah dono ka alag alag conversation ho jaata hai, hai na sir? Aapke paas pehle client kaam ka hai uske baad baat hoti hai maturity ki maturity at the end woh aapke haath mein hoti hai. Ab agar aap ek baar maine WhatsApp pe aapko photo bheja hai main abhi baat kar rahi hu ki by lead sahi nahi aa rahi hai relevant nahi hai uske ek reason ye hai. WhatsApp open kiya aapne?
Customer: Kar liya madam.
Executive: Yes. Toh WhatsApp pe maine ek photo bheja hai dekh pa rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan ji dekh pa rahe hai.
Executive: Yes. Toh first aap ye dekho 26th May, 26th June, October also November is 13 days off, hai na? Har last June se har mahine mein 27, 26 days har mahine active hai woh bhi bahut achi cheez hai. Theek hai? Lekin agar aap niche dekhoge last June mein humne 71 by lead consumption kiya matlab 27 din active rahe pure mahine mein 71 by lead consumption kiya uske niche agar aap dekhoge zero se char ghante ke andar ka jo by lead ho aapne 84 consumption kiya hai baki 14 aur ek 1%. It means aapne 70 mein se seedha seedha aapne iski 60% sorry 50% 50 by lead yani 70 mein se 50 by lead aapne kaam ki consume kari hai uske baad jo aapka by lead bach raha hai aapka matlab 10, 11 jo ki 14 aur 1% mein minus ho gaya woh aapka all is okay. Toh agar aap dekhoge shuruwat ke time mein aapko business is wajah se aa raha tha kyunki aap fresh customer pe kaam karte the. Lekin jaise jaise aapne feedback diya company ne aapko waise waise results diye. Aapne kya kaam kara aapka service activation dheere dheere down hone laga matlab aap pure 30 din toh active toh ho lekin by lead consumption aap zero se char ghante ke andar ka ratio har mahine agar aap dekhoge down hone laga hai. Aap July mein dekho theek thaak, hai na? August mein hamara 76%, September mein 67%.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai aapki baat agree hu main mana nahi kar raha but aap ye dekho na 62%, 56%, 67%. Agar aap 56% bhi lagao chalo madam main toh 0.1% ki baat kar raha hu main koi 50 ki nahi jaise 84% hai shuru mein agar aap dekhoge June mein. 84% wala bhi mature nahi hua mera toh 56 wala bhi nahi hua jisme achi lead aayi ho.
Executive: Aap samjhe na madam? Aap sir dekho maturity ka issue ho sakta hai. Maturity ke customer aa raha hai apne kaam se aa raha hai fir baat kar raha hai price leke chala ja raha hai.
Customer: Genuine toh nahi aa raha na madam?
Executive: Sir genuine keh ke nahi aa raha sir abhi are not se inke 70 ke 70 by lead aapki relevant hongi ya 70 ke 70 customer sirf aapke product ki baat kar rahe hai. 70 mein se saat toh hongi madam ye toh aap agree karte ho na?
Executive: Aap mujhe of course kitni?
Customer: 70 mein se saat 10% only.
Executive: Sir 70 mein se saat of course hongi lekin isme se deal aapki do ya teen logo ke saath hogi aur woh do ya teen nikalne ke liye aapko 100% percent service use karni padegi sir.
Customer: Madam main kya keh raha hu 70 mein se saat agar genuine aa jaye.
Customer: Ye saat mein se agar ek bhi mature ho jaye toh main manta hu IndiaMART successful hai hamare liye. Ya bahut badhiya cheez hai hamare liye IndiaMART.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: 70 leads ke andar se agar seven leads genuine hoti hai aur un seven leads ke andar se agar meri ek mature hoti hai toh main manta hu ki IndiaMART mere liye bahut badhiya hai.
Executive: Sir main weekly ka nahi aapko bol sakti hu lekin of course sir hum aapko is hafte mein ek pure mahine mein 70 by lead de rahe hote hai package ke hisab se agar aap 70 by lead consumption kar rahe ho aur woh by lead 90% 70 mein se 90% yani 70 mein se 60 by lead aap zero se char ghante ke andar ka consumption kar rahe ho apne product wise consumption kar rahe ho toh usme se deal ho sakta hai 1% ke us month mein shayad nahi lekin agar aap same next month bhi same tarike se kaam kar rahe ho toh obviously si baat hai aane wale ek se do mahine mein jo paisa aapne pure saal bhar mein IndiaMART mein lagaya usko char se panch guna paisa aap kama lete ho. Ye ratio bahut fix hai.
Customer: Mera toh madam package package ka kharcha nikal jaye toh hi bahut hai koi baat nahi hai main ek baar aur try karunga.
Executive: ₹28,000 invest kara uske char se panch guna ₹28,000 nahi hota. Aap aap ye keh rahe ho ki zero se four wali hum ratio badhaye aap yahi keh rahe ho na?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Theek hai koi baat nahi main bolta nahi main zero se four wali pe ratio pe dhyan de.
Executive: Abhi dekho hamara November month 18th hai, theek hai? I just requesting you abhi aapne conversation ko thoda sa short kar dijiye please main office aa rahi hu thoda sa conversation ko short karte hai. Ab hum at the end iska yahi hai na ki zero se four wali leads hume badhani hai.
Executive: Mera main shortly agar batau aap abhi jitne bhi din bache hai usme you can try. Abhi 25 by lead iske alawa abhi aap achi khasa by lead aapke paas hai aap zero se char ghante ke andar ka by lead consumption karo aur jo customers aapke paas direct inquiry aur call kar rahe hai usko revert same time karo uske liye apna lead manager service use karte raho.
Customer: Woh toh madam jaise jo customer hume hamari catalog dekh ke direct call aata hai woh toh hum on the spot uthate hai.
Executive: Are sir usko toh uthate hai.
Executive: Main aapko bol rahi hu ye lo WhatsApp pe aap dekho isiliye main aapko performance report apne aap se khulwa li thi taaki aapko aisa na lage main kuch aur cheez aapko bhej rahi hu. Ye aapka November mein aapke paas overall che customers ne call kari hai aur che customers mein humne teen customers ko call miss kar diya hai aur teen customers ko receive kiya hai jiska aapka call average har mahine maximum aapko char se panch customers ko call aata hai isse zyada nahi aa raha abhi, theek hai? Aur aapka call ka average kam se kam teen teen minute ka zyada hota hai. Theek hai? Toh aap se request hai aapko.
Customer: Main karta hu.
Executive: Sir sir ek second bas ek second abhi kya main aapko jo improvement bataya woh aap kar le is month mein hum next month first ya second ko baat karte hai ab tak ke liye main concern close kar sakti hu?
Customer: Kar do madam kar do.
Executive: Thank you. Main aapko PNS number bata rahi hu aapka jo bhi customer aapke paas call karta hai woh number save kar lo IndiaMART new buyer ke naam se toh aapko koi bhi call hogi aapko miss nahi kar paoge aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh kar rakha hai already kar rakha hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Okay madam thank you.
Executive: Number bhej du main WhatsApp pe aapke paas?
Customer: Theek hai madam bhej do bhej do.
Executive: Theek hai main aapke paas number bhej rahi hu save kar lo new IndiaMART buyer ke naam se. Yes.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting genuine customers through buyleads.

- Buyers are turning into sellers.

- Bulk leads are not useful.

- Account managers are not providing solutions.

- Profile visibility is not improving lead quality.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of fresh customers.

- Executive shared performance report on WhatsApp.

- Executive suggested focusing on leads within 0-4 hours.

- Executive assured to connect in the next month.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, genuine customers, performance
